title: 1918: The Pros & Cons of Drop Sets, How to Know if You Have Reached Your Muscle Building Potential, Ways to Deal With People Who Shame Healthy Living Choices & More
description:

  • Mind Pump Fit Tip: For long-term fitness success you MUST eliminate the victim mentality! (2:26)

  • How eating an ultra-processed diet can change your brain! (29:15)

  • Happy Meals for adults? (43:09)
  • Adam recommends Eat the Rich: The GameStop Saga on Netflix. (48:55)
  • Where are all the influencers pushing those NFT projects now? (55:11)
  • The Caldera movement is growing. (56:45)

  • #Quah question #2 - What is your opinion of the decline bench? I have never added it to my programming. Am I missing out on something or is it just a pointless movement if I‚Äôm doing flat and incline bench presses? (1:10:16)
  • #Quah question #3 - How do you know if you‚Äôve reached your natural potential for hypertrophy? (1:12:45)
  • #Quah question #4 - What's the best way to deal with social situations where you're more fitness/nutrition focused than other people in your circle, and they may demonize you for how you go about your way of living? (1:16:58)
